project.name: EBIWS2-Java
project.description: Sample Java clients for EMBL-EBI tool web services.

target.name: package-dependencies
target.description: Generate archive of dependencies from lib.dir.

target.name: test
target.description: Run smoke tests for generated jars.

target.name: distclean
target.description: Remove downloaded, generated and compiled code, classes and jars

target.name: axis1
target.description: Axis 1.x: generate stubs and build SOAP clients

target.name: axis1-stubs
target.description: Axis 1.x: generate code stubs for SOAP clients

format.pattern: EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss z
